title: (x) Decorative loopy typeface from Tokion - Tourette {Ricardo Cordoba}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121113000im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/vd03_4397.jpg)

The issue (July/Aug 2005) features this typeface throughout for headlines. It’s even got numerals!

 [‹ type on receipts! help needed identifying font!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121113000/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31426 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Childhood is Calling" girly script - Wendy {Patty} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121113000/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31410 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bergh

comments.content: Is this a step-up or step-down transformer?
